hero.description: TransGate delivers precise, professional translation services for academic and scientific work, alongside expert consultations to enhance research quality and impact. Serving clients in over 35 countries, we empower scholars worldwide to communicate their ideas with clarity, accuracy, and confidence.

accuracy.title: Are you looking for a reliable & professional translation?
accuracy.description: Translation is not just converting words — it’s the precise transfer of meaning, context, and intent. That’s why we provide you with accurate, high-quality translations delivered by certified language experts.

card1.title: Flawless Translation
card1.text: We deliver translations free of errors, preventing delays or setbacks in your academic and professional endeavors. Our precision eliminates mistakes that could harm your progress.

card2.title: Specialized Linguists
card2.text: Your documents are managed by experts with deep linguistic knowledge and contextual understanding.

card3.title: Academic Research Support
card3.text: We provide guidance to enhance the quality and impact of your research. From structuring your thesis or dissertation to refining your arguments and methodology, we help ensure your work meets the highest academic standards. Our support empowers you to present ideas with clarity, rigor, and confidence.

previousWork.title: We Have a Proven Track Record
previousWork.subtitle: Contact us now and join our partners in success

items.title: Translation of Banking Documents – Bank of Oman Arab (2023)
items.desc: In 2023, Trans-Gate handled the translation of a series of critical documents for Bank of Oman Arab, including financial reports, legal documents, and banking contracts. Our team ensured absolute accuracy in financial and banking terminology while meeting all required quality standards.

items.title: Regulatory Translation for Import and Sale of Alcoholic Beverages – Iraqi General Customs Authority (2022)
items.desc: In 2022, Trans-Gate translated regulatory provisions governing the import and sale of alcoholic beverages. The work focused on legal precision and accurate interpretation of regulatory texts in compliance with international standards.

items.title: Translation of Commercial Contracts and International Agreements – ICC (2020)
items.desc: Trans-Gate translated commercial contracts and international agreements for the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC), ensuring legal accuracy and precise commercial terminology to facilitate international trade.

items.title: Patent Translation – World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO) (2025)
items.desc: In 2025, Trans-Gate translated patents for WIPO, focusing on technical and scientific accuracy to protect intellectual property rights while adhering to strict quality and review standards.

items.title: Academic Consulting for PhD Researchers – King Abdulaziz University (2024)
items.desc: In 2024, Trans-Gate provided comprehensive academic consulting services for PhD researchers, including research design support, data analysis, and professional academic writing to meet publication and academic review requirements.

items.title: Academic Consulting for Researchers – King Saud University (2024)
items.desc: During the same year, Trans-Gate delivered advanced academic consulting services for researchers at King Saud University, focusing on improving research quality, data analysis, reference organization, and academic drafting.

about.question: What makes Trans-Gate the preferred choice for translation services and academic consulting?
about.answer: Trans-Gate stands out by elevating your words and empowering your intellect through a combination of accuracy, expertise, and expert guidance.
about.translationDesc: We provide accurate, professional translations for academic papers, research, and official documents while preserving meaning, tone, and academic integrity.
about.consultingDesc: Our consulting services aim to enhance the quality of your research, strengthen its structure, improve academic impact, and support critical thinking and clear academic writing.
about.card1Desc: Precise and professional translation for academic and official documents.
about.card2Desc: Expert academic guidance to elevate research quality and impact.

accuracy.title: Accuracy & Professionalism
accuracy.description: At TransGate, we ensure every translation is delivered with the highest level of accuracy, quality, and professionalism through strict review processes and expert linguists.

card1.title: Certified Quality
card1.text: We provide certified translations accepted by embassies, universities, and official institutions.

card2.title: Specialized Translators
card2.text: Our translators are experts in legal, academic, and medical fields to ensure industry-level precision.

card3.title: Fast & Reliable Delivery
card3.text: We deliver accurate translations on time with guaranteed consistency and professional formatting.

professionalism.title: How can academic consultations at Trans-Gate improve your research?
professionalism.desc: Our consultations provide personalized support to identify gaps, clarify concepts, and structure your work for maximum clarity and impact. We guide you step by step, ensuring your research is logically organized, academically rigorous, and clearly communicated.

makeAppointment.title: Access Our Services with Ease
makeAppointment.desc: Experience seamless access to TransGate's translation and academic consultation services. Our streamlined process allows you to submit your documents, request consultations, and receive expert support quickly and efficiently, saving you time while ensuring high-quality results.
makeAppointment.desc2: From graduation certificates and legal contracts to theses, dissertations, and medical reports—TransGate is your trusted partner for all translation needs.

testimonials.title: Our Customers' Positive Comments
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by researchers and clients worldwide—here’s what they say about their experience.

items.text: Dr. Hager is one of the best people in the field of translation. Extremely professional and delivers excellent quality. She delivered exactly on time. Thank you so much for your effort! I will definitely work with you again. Your dedication and attention to detail truly satisfy the client.
items.name: Mariam Adel

items.text: I honestly couldn’t believe how accurate the translation was, even after I converted the file to PDF everything stayed perfectly aligned. The work was extremely precise, and you delivered exactly what I needed and more. Thank you so much for the amazing effort.
items.name: Ahmed Mostafa

items.text: I really appreciate your accuracy, commitment to deadlines, and the quality of the translation itself. Everything was delivered better than I expected in terms of timing and professionalism. Honestly, I’ve never dealt with someone as respectful and understanding as you. May God bless you.
items.name: Sara Hany

partners.title: Our Partners

q1.a: Yes. We offer officially certified translation for all types of documents, accepted by embassies, government offices, universities, and institutions.

q2.q: How can I send my documents?
q2.a: You can send your documents via WhatsApp, email, or upload them directly through our platform.

q3.q: How long does the translation take?
q3.a: Delivery time depends on the document type and size. However, we always ensure on-time delivery based on the agreed deadline.

q4.q: Can you translate academic research and theses?
q4.a: Absolutely. We specialize in translating academic papers, research, theses, dissertations, and scientific studies while preserving accuracy and academic integrity.

q5.a: Yes. We provide accurate medical translation for reports, prescriptions, and health-related documents with full confidentiality.

about-us.title: About TransGate
about-us.subtitle: We enrich knowledge. We empower minds.
about-us.paragraph1: TransGate is dedicated to enriching knowledge and empowering minds by providing professional translation services for all types of documents, with a strong focus on accuracy, clarity, and impact in every word. Our approach goes beyond literal translation to convey the full meaning, tone, and academic integrity of your content.
about-us.paragraph2: In addition to translation services, we offer specialized academic consultations to support students and researchers in organizing their projects, improving clarity, and enhancing academic impact. Our goal is to help you present your ideas effectively and achieve your best results.
about-us.paragraph3: TransGate operates with core values rooted in accuracy, integrity, professionalism, and client empowerment. We pay close attention to detail while maintaining clarity and inspiration—ensuring every client receives services and guidance that elevate the quality of their work and strengthen their academic journey.

mission.paragraph: We strive to deliver accurate, high-quality academic and scientific translations while offering specialized consultations that improve research quality and organization. Our mission is to empower clients to achieve their best outcomes through language support and guidance, while fostering a supportive environment that builds confidence and promotes continuous academic growth.

ethics.title: Ethical Standards
ethics.subtitle: Our commitment to professional integrity and responsible academic support.

p1.title: Professional Standards
p1.desc: We deliver translation and academic support services in accordance with the highest professional and ethical standards.

p2.title: Academic Integrity
p2.desc: We promote honest learning and ensure our services support skill development without replacing personal effort.

p3.title: No Ghostwriting
p3.desc: We do not complete assignments, write research papers, or prepare theses/dissertations on behalf of students or researchers.

p4.title: Responsible Use
p4.desc: Our services are intended for learning, improvement, and communication only, and must not be used for cheating or unethical purposes.

ethics.p1: At TransGate, our goal is to provide academic support and translation services in line with the highest professional and ethical standards.
ethics.p2: We offer clear, accurate guidance as well as editing, proofreading, and consultation services to help students, researchers, and professionals develop their academic and research skills.
ethics.p3: We do not complete academic tasks, write research papers, or prepare university theses on behalf of clients. We also do not alter content in a way that violates ethical standards or academic integrity policies.
ethics.highlight: Clients are fully responsible for their academic and professional work, and for complying with relevant laws, institutional policies, and academic integrity requirements.

footer.desc: Professional translation and academic consulting — delivering clarity, accuracy, and impact worldwide.

article.title: Ethics Policy
article.subtitle: Our commitment to professional and ethical standards

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer on Academic Integrity and Ethical Policy
disclaimer.body1: Trans-Gate is committed to providing translation and educational support services in line with high professional and ethical standards. Our mission is to deliver accurate, clear, and helpful guidance while promoting honest learning and academic integrity. We offer translation, tutoring, editing, reviewing, and consultation services for students, researchers, and professionals who seek to expand their knowledge, improve academic writing, and develop research skills.
disclaimer.body2: We do not complete assignments, write research papers, theses, dissertations, or any academic work on behalf of clients, nor do we create or alter content in ways that mislead or violate ethical standards.
disclaimer.body3: By using our services, you accept full responsibility for your academic or professional work. Our role is to guide and support, not to replace your effort. Any assistance provided, including research support, translation, feedback, or editing, is intended solely for learning, improvement, or communication purposes. Misusing our services is strictly prohibited.
disclaimer.body4: Submitting translations, advice, suggestions, or reviewed materials as original work without proper acknowledgment violates both academic integrity and professional ethics, and Trans-Gate does not condone such actions. Clients are responsible for ensuring that any materials or guidance they receive comply with relevant laws, regulations, and the academic or ethical policies of their institutions.
disclaimer.body5: Trans-Gate is not liable for how its services are used, and clients bear full responsibility for the final use of any materials, notes, or consultations provided. We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone attempting to misuse our platform for academic dishonesty, information manipulation, or other unethical purposes. By continuing to use our services, clients agree to comply with this ethics policy and to support responsible, ethical learning and professional practices.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: We are here to help. Reach out for translation services, academic consultations, or any inquiries.
